channel.title: A couple of problems
channel.description: 1- i added items to my server and i put it in shop and it says non existing item sell for 1 coin-how do i fix 2- How do i change what the shops say on top of their head 3- lastly i added an item like dragon fire shield and put the code in item.cfg than i added it under shield spot and when i wield it it goes as wep spot. I went to item.java after that and added dragon fire shield code under shields and it still goes under wep spot 4- i am using project czar and i cant spawn a 5 digit item which is like 3rd age and skillcapes and all of that

item.title: A couple of problems
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Edit your pickup command. Start the substring 2 spaces later, or reformat the command so it uses split(String) instead of substring.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of problems
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

1- i added items to my server and i put it in shop and it says non existing item sell for 1 coin-how do i fix
Look for that in client.java.
2- How do i change what the shops say on top of their head
Edit that in NPCHandler.java.
3- lastly i added an item like dragon fire shield and put the code in item.cfg than i added it under shield spot and when i wield it it goes as wep spot. I went to item.java after that and added dragon fire shield code under shields and it still goes under wep spot
You may have an Item4.java. Put it in that, too.
4- i am using project czar and i cant spawn a 5 digit item which is like 3rd age and skillcapes and all of that
Ok. And?

Read full topic
